metering: Matrix, center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), spot (digital zoom 2x or more)
contents: Main unit, Camera Strap, USB Cable UC-E16, User Manual, Warranty Card
focallength: 4.6-23.0 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 26-130 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
audiovideointerface: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL
shootingmodes: Approx. 98 percent horizontal and 98 percent vertical (compared to actual picture)
